overview: From 2025-06-13 to 2025-06-14, elizaos/eliza had 17 new PRs (14 merged), 0 new issues, and 8 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Add automated AI code reviews with Claude to enhance PR feedback
topIssues.author: naevern
topIssues.body:
We can integrate automated AI code reviews into our GitHub workflow using [Claude Code Base Action](https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code-base-action). This setup will automatically review all incoming pull requests, providing immediate feedback aligned with our guidelines, code style, and best practices.

This does not replace human code reviews, which will continue to be conducted without exception. Instead, AI acts as an additional set of "eyes," consistently reviewing PRs without fatigue, improving our security and reliability.

Benefits:

Provides instant, consistent feedback on new PRs.
Reduces waiting times and accelerates feedback loops for developers.
Adds another safety layer, catching issues human reviewers might occasionally overlook.
Integrating AI reviews will complement our current workflow and further enhance code quality and developer productivity.

topPRs.title: Split server into separate package and import back into CLI
topPRs.author: lalalune
topPRs.body:
This PR creates a server package

This lets anyone add a server to their backend without the CLI, which can be handing for creating custom apps and interfaces

I'm using it in a project now where I want to pair down a lot of stuf

topPRs.title: ui: apply design system to agent creator forms
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- Applied consistent design system to agent creator forms and tabs
- Updated character-form component with dark theme styling using existing sidebar CSS variables
- Implemented tab styling similar to agent-sidebar with proper focus states
- Added section headers with clean typography and spacing

## Changes
- **character-form.tsx**: Updated tabs, form inputs, labels, and layout styling
- **array-input.tsx**: Applied design system to tag input component
- Used `bg-sidebar-background`, `border-sidebar-border`, `text-sidebar-foreground` for consistency
- Applied `rounded-none` throughout to match design specifications
- Added proper focus states with accent color `#3B82F6`

## Test plan
- [ ] Verify agent creator forms display with dark theme styling
- [ ] Check that all form inputs use consistent colors and borders
- [ ] Confirm tabs have proper active/hover states
- [ ] Test array inputs work correctly with new styling
- [ ] Ensure all text is properly readable with contrast

topPRs.title: feat: Enhance chat UI with improved styling and components
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- Add new animated markdown component with smooth rendering and improved user experience
- Implement chat container with better layout structure and responsive design
- Add enhanced code block component with syntax highlighting using Shiki
- Update chat bubble styling with improved animations and visual feedback
- Enhance message list with better scrolling behavior and auto-scroll functionality
- Add new markdown parser with support for line breaks and remark plugins
- Update dependencies to support better rendering capabilities (shiki, remark-breaks, use-stick-to-bottom)

## Test plan
- [ ] Verify chat messages render with improved styling
- [ ] Test animated markdown rendering in chat bubbles
- [ ] Confirm code blocks display with proper syntax highlighting
- [ ] Test auto-scroll behavior in message list
- [ ] Verify responsive design across different screen sizes
- [ ] Test markdown parsing with line breaks and formatting
